description: Main customer service hotline available round the clock, 365 days a year. Services: General inquiries, balance checks, package activations, complaints, bill payments.
Technical support hotline for internet and connectivity issues. Peak hours may have longer wait times. Best time to call: 8 AM - 10 AM, 2 PM - 4 PM on weekdays.
Dedicated billing support for bill inquiries, disputes, payment issues, and account adjustments. Not available on public holidays.

hours: 24/7 for critical issues, 8 AM - 6 PM for general inquiries
description: Dedicated line for corporate and enterprise customers. Priority support with faster response times. General inquiries weekdays only, critical issues handled 24/7.
WhatsApp support for quick queries, balance checks, and basic assistance. Average response time: 5-10 minutes. Send 'Hi' to start conversation.
Live chat support available on website. Click chat icon on bottom right. Average response time: 2-3 minutes during operating hours.
Email support for detailed inquiries, documentation submission, and formal complaints. Include account number and contact details in email.
Walk-in service centers for in-person assistance. No appointment needed. Token system for queue management.
Service centers in Kandy, Galle, Jaffna, Kurunegala, Negombo and other major cities.
LankaTel retail stores in shopping malls follow mall operating hours. Services include sales, activations, and basic support.
Social media support for quick queries. DM for account-specific issues. Public posts monitored during operating hours.
Self-service options available anytime: Balance check (*#456#), Data usage (*#789#), Package activation (*#123#), Bill payment (app), Plan information (app), Complaint status (app).
Field technician visits for installations and repairs. Schedule via 1234 or app. Sunday visits available for emergency repairs only (additional charge applies).

LankaTel support availability during public holidays: Hotlines (1234, 1235): 24/7 as usual. Billing (1236): Closed on public holidays. Service Centers: Closed on public holidays. Retail Stores: 10 AM - 6 PM on most holidays. Major holidays (New Year, Vesak, Christmas): Limited services, check announcements.

Expected higher wait times during: Weekdays 5 PM - 8 PM, Month-end billing period (25th - 5th), After service outages, Monday mornings. Recommended: Use self-service options or call during off-peak hours (8 AM - 10 AM, 2 PM - 4 PM) for faster service.
